=== Summary ===
A simple build notification monitor for Hudson
=== History ===
This small utility uses a notification area icon and the inotify interface to alert the user on a successful or failed build for a Hudson Continuous Integration server (https://hudson.dev.java.net/).  Users can configure which Hudson jobs will present notifications and affect the build status icon .
